text: Colleen Dewhurst (June 3, 1924 â€“ August 22, 1991) was an American and Canadian actress. She played Helen Benson in Man on a String. She also played Monique in The Last Run. She was also a stage actress. Dewhurst was born in Montreal, Quebec. She died in South Salem, New York of cervical cancer at the age of 67.
